pli-tv-pvr1.4:1.1: Of the seven classes of offence in how many classes of offence are the offences for one indulging in sexual intercourse comprised?
pli-tv-pvr1.4:1.2: Of the seven classes of offence the offences for one indulging in sexual intercourse are comprised in three classes of offence:
pli-tv-pvr1.4:1.3: it may be the class of offence involving Defeat; it may be the class of offence that is a grave one; it may be the class of offence of wrong-doing …
pli-tv-pvr1.4:2.1: Of the seven classes of offence in how many classes of offence is the offence of easing oneself … out of disrespect comprised?
pli-tv-pvr1.4:2.2: … It is comprised in one class of offence:
pli-tv-pvr1.4:2.3: in the class of offence of wrong-doing.
pli-tv-pvr1.4:3.1: Concluded is the Fourth Chapter: that on Comprised In
